description:
Molt was an Imperial vice admiral who served as head of security at Neue Sanssouci by 798 UC. Feeling responsible after the abduction of Kaiser http://anidb.net/ch225 [Erwin Josef II] by http://anidb.net/ch210 [Alfred von Lansberg] and http://anidb.net/ch209 [Leopold Schumacher], he committed suicide.
Source: Gineipaedia
name: Molt
